name: SpaceTime Liason
description:
Are you prepared to cross space and time to find true love? Experience the challenges of interstellar first dates with Spacetime Liaison, the dating sim where you actually go on a date! Eat a nice meal and engage in deep conversations with your potential suitors, but watch your manners. If you talk with your mouth full, make a mess, or handle yourself poorly in conversation, your date might just give up on you.

This iteration features a date with the charming Prince Horatio. He cares greatly about proper dining etiquette, so make sure to keep clean and speak graciously.
